TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MatchNoneMessageFilter extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter

Docs.summary: Represents a query that is never satisfied by a message that it tests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides a filter that never allows a message through. Specifically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A> methods returns `false` for every message that is not `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor can be used to create distinct instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Match(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message) cil managed

Docs.summary: This method returns for every message that is not .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The difference between the two overloads of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MatchNoneMessageFilter.Match%2A> method is that one takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> parameter and buffers the entire contents of a message (including its body) into memory, while the other takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> parameter and does not buffer the body.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Match(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer messageBuffer) cil managed

Docs.summary: This method returns for every message that is not .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method takes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> parameter, which buffers the entire contents of a message (including its body) into memory, and allows the body to be inspected.
